name: Corolla Cross 2023
description: A compact SUV from Toyota, Corolla Cross 2023 offers a blend of efficiency and versatility, making it a great choice for city dwellers with occasional adventure trips.

name: Sienna 2023
description: Toyota's signature minivan, the Sienna 2023, brings forward advanced safety features and a spacious interior, making family trips more comfortable and secure.

name: Venza 2023
description: Venza 2023 is Toyota's answer to the luxury midsize SUV segment, offering a refined design paired with powerful performance.

name: 4Runner 2023
description: Built for the adventurers, the 4Runner 2023 boasts rugged capabilities, ensuring you're always ready for any terrain.
